website_summaries.verdict: This plush Naruto doll sports an impressively designed ninja costume, adorable eyes, and a durable construction, making it great for playtime and bedtime.
cons: We don’t think Naruto’s face would survive a ride in the washing machine

customer_reviews.title: BELIEVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: All i can say for a plush i've been wanting for 9 years, definitely worth the wait. Once again Great Eastern Entertainment not only satisfied with their Sonic The Hedgehog & Fairy Tail line but jaw droppingly impressed me with their naruto line. This plush is based off of Naruto's appearance from the original naruto anime when he was 13 in the anime. The plush is pretty anime accurate great rubber material on the leaf headband and a nice size great fur on top of the jacket also a little finger detail and basically for all naruto fans and collectors this is an item you need in your collection BELIEVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: BobaFettfan01

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much!!! I made a review on Youtube about it, just type in daveyburr naruto plush doll review if you want to see it. The color is amazing and the quality is great. It is a nice soft fabric. Also, very detailed, it has the pouch, symbols, and the leg band that Naruto actually has in the show. I wouldn't recommend playing with it but it is for more of display.
customer_reviews.author: Davey Anthony

customer_reviews.title: BELIEVE IT !
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little Naruto boi. He chills with me when I watch Naruto and eat ramen.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Naruto Plush by Great Eastern Entertainment... Great Eastern
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is a Anime fan extreme! He'll love this Naruto to add to his collection so he cam make more home videos. As these anime plushes can be expensive...this one had a decent price, nice size, a design..actually looks like tje cartoon character! I'm pleased. I'm sure my grandson will like it too!
customer_reviews.author: Dwranny

customer_reviews.title: Plush toy
customer_reviews.text: On the smaller side but my 7 year old loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well put together.
customer_reviews.text: A well made plush doll and true to the anime character.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an authentic GE Entertainment plush. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: T. harden

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My baby is crazy with anime and more with this series, I am delighted ... very satisfied with my purchase, good product of good material and good packaging ... delivered just in time ...
customer_reviews.author: Merced25

customer_reviews.title: So cute and Hugable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend's B-Day she LOVE Naruto and i like it too. i didn't take long to get here about 2-4 days after odering it. When it got here it was so cute i wanted to keep for myself :). and it pretty good size. It has great fabric. It has all the little details of Naruto. Right down to the kunai and shuriken pouch on his leg and back hip :). When i gave it to her she was very happy :) i am very happy with these Naruto Plush
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dodds

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the little child inside of my boyfriend and he loved it. It's small enough that he doesn't feel embarressed & the quality is very great. I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Hubish

customer_reviews.title: Naruto is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Good condition. Son loves it. =) Colors true to his character on the show at that stage. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: MaMa

customer_reviews.title: Naruto fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and Kakashi for my son, my husband is a big fan of Naruto and he said it was great! Nice detail, doesn't seem cheap or low quality.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: It had good definition in the features and my granddaughter loved it ...
customer_reviews.text: The colors were vivid, especially the eyes. It had good definition in the features and my granddaughter loved it to add to her collection. I wish it was a little larger but she liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice plush for bookshelf display
customer_reviews.text: Nice plush for bookshelf display. Probably Not durable enough for daily play. Headband detaches easily and doll probably would not survive a machine washing intact.
customer_reviews.author: H. N. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Just Perfect BELIVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It came pretty fast and not to mention all the detail it's pretty soft and this was a gift for a friend he loved it. to him it was his child that show why you should get one best thing ever BELIVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: Naruto collectible
customer_reviews.text: there's not much to say. this is a simple and good gift for anyone who wants to start a collection or doesn't want there child playing with toys with sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Fictionaldreamer

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for :)
customer_reviews.text: showed up early! was in great condition though the box was a little worse for wear, a gift for a new Naruto fan of older age. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Campbell

product_meta.title: Great Eastern Entertainment Naruto Plush
product_meta.description: This beautiful three dimensional plush character is sure to please any fan of anime, manga, or Japanese culture. Made of high quality fabrics these detailed stuffed characters are collected, traded, and shared among fans. Great Eastern Entertainment is one of the largest manufacturers of licensed anime products and their attention to detail is impeccable.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
